amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to revoke funding previously awarded to or within the State of North Carolina.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34, printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use offunds to be used torevoke funding previously awarded to or within the State of North Carolina.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pittenger amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 192 (Roll no. 255).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pittenger amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 192 (Roll no. 255).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Pittenger.
